entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Periods of light snow beginning late this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022
